statements: SELECT * FROM diversity_training_materials;
SELECT material_name, material_url FROM diversity_training_materials WHERE upload_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT material_id, material_name FROM diversity_training_materials ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT material_description FROM diversity_training_materials WHERE material_name LIKE 'Inclusive%';
SELECT material_url, upload_date FROM diversity_training_materials WHERE material_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM diversity_training_materials ORDER BY material_name DESC, upload_date ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT material_name, material_description FROM diversity_training_materials WHERE upload_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY upload_date DESC
SELECT material_name, material_url FROM diversity_training_materials WHERE material_id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', '456e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000')
SELECT * FROM diversity_training_materials WHERE material_name LIKE '%inclusive%'
SELECT material_name, material_description FROM diversity_training_materials WHERE upload_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY material_name ASC
SELECT * FROM employee_training_materials;
SELECT training_topic, training_description FROM employee_training_materials WHERE training_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM employee_training_materials ORDER BY training_topic DESC;
SELECT training_topic, training_material_url FROM employee_training_materials WHERE training_description ILIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM employee_progress_tracking WHERE completion_status = true ORDER BY progress_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_training_materials WHERE training_id = 5;
SELECT training_topic, training_description FROM employee_training_materials WHERE training_topic LIKE '%customer%';
SELECT training_id, training_material_url FROM employee_training_materials ORDER BY training_id DESC;
SELECT employee_id, training_id, progress_date FROM employee_progress_tracking WHERE progress_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_completed_trainings FROM employee_progress_tracking WHERE completion_status = true;
SELECT * FROM DiversityTrainingMaterials;
SELECT material_name, material_description FROM DiversityTrainingMaterials;
SELECT material_name, material_description, material_link FROM DiversityTrainingMaterials WHERE material_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeProgress WHERE progress_percentage > 50;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department FROM Employees ORDER BY department DESC;
SELECT * FROM DiversityTrainingMaterials WHERE material_name = 'Inclusivity Training';
SELECT material_name, material_link FROM DiversityTrainingMaterials WHERE material_id = 1;
SELECT material_name, material_description FROM DiversityTrainingMaterials WHERE material_id > 2;
SELECT material_name, COUNT(*) FROM DiversityTrainingMaterials GROUP BY material_name;
SELECT e.employee_name, d.material_name FROM Employees e JOIN EmployeeProgress ep ON e.employee_id = ep.employee_id JOIN DiversityTrainingMaterials d ON ep.material_id = d.material_id;
SELECT * FROM DiversityTrainingMaterials;
SELECT material_name, category FROM DiversityTrainingMaterials WHERE category = 'Diversity';
SELECT material_name, description, upload_date FROM DiversityTrainingMaterials ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT material_name, uploaded_by FROM DiversityTrainingMaterials WHERE uploaded_by LIKE '%John%';
SELECT material_name, category, uploaded_by FROM DiversityTrainingMaterials WHERE category = 'Inclusion' AND uploaded_by = 'Jane Doe';
SELECT * FROM DiversityTrainingMaterials;
SELECT material_name, description, category FROM DiversityTrainingMaterials WHERE category = 'Diversity';
SELECT material_name, upload_date, uploaded_by FROM DiversityTrainingMaterials ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department, position FROM Employees JOIN EmployeeProgress ON Employees.employee_id = EmployeeProgress.employee_id;
SELECT category_name, category_description FROM Categories WHERE category_name LIKE '%Training%';
SELECT * FROM training_materials;
SELECT material_name, material_description FROM training_materials WHERE material_id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name FROM employees ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT category_name, category_description FROM material_categories WHERE category_id BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT material_name, upload_date FROM training_materials ORDER BY upload_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM training_materials;
SELECT material_name, material_description FROM training_materials WHERE material_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM material_categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT material_name, review_text FROM training_materials JOIN material_reviews ON training_materials.material_id = material_reviews.material_id WHERE review_date > '2022-01-01';
